q1: Do you think Argentina is all about Messi?
q2: One person can't make a winning team.
a2: No but messi is there star player
q3: There are other great players there too though
a3: To all the bad players out there...
q4: No one will ever replace Messi in Argentina.
a4: Actually, someone will likely replace Messi as an attacking striker or midfield when he retires.
q5: When did Lionel Messi join Argentina?
a5: Messi started playing for the Argentinian national team in 2005.
